column1: '''Neekerbreekers''' were large and loud insects related to crickets. They dwelt in the [[Midgewater Marshes]] and squeaked all through the night
column3: breek-neek''".  [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam Gamgee]] gave them the name 'Neekerbreekers'.<ref>{{FR|I11}}</ref>

column1: ''Neekerbreekers'' were named so because of their sound
column2: perhaps like that of a cricket.<ref name="Nomen">{{HM|N}}
